string.text: ED glass installation that replaces the ordinary lens to minimize the effects of chromatic aberration and secondary spectrum, resulting in better visuals.\n \n %c[ui_gray_3] Press %c[d_cyan]$$ACTION_NIGHT_VISION$$%c[ui_gray_3] while zoomed in with binoculars to toggle contrast improvement.

Night vision technology installation for low light conditions, which relies on night-useful spectral and intensity range techniques to sense radiation that is invisible to a human observer.\n \n %c[ui_gray_3] Press %c[d_cyan]$$ACTION_NIGHT_VISION$$%c[ui_gray_3] while zoomed in with binoculars to toggle night vision module.

An improvement to the night vision technology, which introduces better system light gain, system resolution and photosensitivity to increase the visual quality.\n \n %c[ui_gray_3] Press %c[d_cyan]$$ACTION_NIGHT_VISION$$%c[ui_gray_3] while zoomed in with binoculars to toggle night vision module.
